tool_description: Tracks and manages dependencies between game assets, identifies missing references, and helps maintain asset integrity across projects.

primary_asset_id.description: ID of the main asset to analyze dependencies for

operation.description: Operation type: analyze, update, verify, resolve_missing

dependency_types.description: Types of dependencies to track: texture, material, model, animation, audio

error_messages: Asset not found: Provide a valid primary_asset_id
Invalid operation: Use one of [analyze, update, verify, resolve_missing]
Invalid dependency type: Use combinations of [texture, material, model, animation, audio]
usage: Provide primary_asset_id and operation. Use analyze to discover dependencies, verify to check integrity, and resolve_missing to fix broken references.

analysis_id.description: Unique identifier for this dependency analysis

direct_dependencies.description: List of directly referenced asset IDs

indirect_dependencies.description: List of indirectly referenced asset IDs

missing_dependencies.description: List of missing or broken dependency references

integrity_status.description: Overall dependency integrity: complete, missing_references, broken_links
